tasks.label: Build via PyInstaller & Run
tasks.detail: Build via PyInstaller under powershell and run
tasks.command: Set-Location scripts; Remove-Item -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue 'dist'; uv run pyinstaller Minify.spec; Copy-Item '..\Minify\bin' 'dist\Minify\bin' -Recurse; Copy-Item '..\Minify\mods' 'dist\Minify\mods' -Recurse; Copy-Item '..\version' 'dist\Minify\version'; Copy-Item '..\readme.md' 'dist\Minify\readme.md'; Copy-Item '..\LICENSE' 'dist\Minify\LICENSE'; Copy-Item '..\Minify\Source2Viewer-CLI.exe' 'dist\Minify'; dist\Minify\Minify.exe
